EmailTemplate.textOnly:
AUGUST, 2, 2018 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/happy-birthday-istio-a-closer-look-at-how-pivotal-is-embedding-the-service-mesh-to-cloud-foundry-kubernetes-and-knative?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Istio 1.0 is Now GA! Istio 1.0 is now GA. Here's what it does, why it matters, and why we're adding it to Cloud Foundry and other projects to make your life better. Take a Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/happy-birthday-istio-a-closer-look-at-how-pivotal-is-embedding-the-service-mesh-to-cloud-foundry-kubernetes-and-knative?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/deploying-software-on-pks-creating-a-continuous-delivery-pipeline-with-spinnaker?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Creating a Continuous Delivery Pipeline with Spinnaker In the first part of this multi-part series, Paul Czarkowski takes you step-by-step on how you can create a continuous delivery pipeline with Netflix's Spinnaker. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/deploying-software-on-pks-creating-a-continuous-delivery-pipeline-with-spinnaker?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-net-developer-s-guide-to-springone-platform-2018?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> The .NET Developer’s Guide to SpringOne Platform 2018 As a .NET developer, you may not think of SpringOne Platform as a conference you'd want to attend. Think again. Tim Hess breaks down must-attend sessions for .NET developers at SpringOne Platform 2018: SPRINGONE <3's .NET <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-net-developer-s-guide-to-springone-platform-2018?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/spring-cloud-data-flow-1-6-is-ga-pcf-scheduler-integration-kubernetes-1-10-and-spring-boot-2-0-compatibility-ci-cd-improvements-and-more?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Spring Cloud Data Flow 1.6 is GA Spring Cloud Data Flow 1.6 includes PCF Scheduler Integration, Kubernetes 1.10 and Spring Boot 2.0 compatibility and CI/CD Improvements. Learn about all of the new features and more with this latest release. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/spring-cloud-data-flow-1-6-is-ga-pcf-scheduler-integration-kubernetes-1-10-and-spring-boot-2-0-compatibility-ci-cd-improvements-and-more?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/this-month-in-spring-july-31st-2018?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> This Month in Spring Josh Long breaks down what's new in Spring and what to keep your eye on. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/this-month-in-spring-july-31st-2018?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/passing-the-automated-test-at-garmin-with-jonathan-regehr-ep-76?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Passing the (Automated) Test at Garmin with Jonathan Regehr (Ep. 76) In this episode of Pivotal Insights, Jonathan Regehr, an architect at Garmin, updates Jeff and Dormain on the company's progress, shares some thoughts on shifting security and QA left, and explains how Garmin is approaching managing its data in a cloud-native way. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/passing-the-automated-test-at-garmin-with-jonathan-regehr-ep-76?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/pivotal-greenplum-5-10-introduces-greenplum-kafka-connector-for-real-time-data-loading?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter&utm_content=1532632193?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Greenplum 5.10 Introduces Greenplum-Kafka Connector for Real Time Data Loading Learn about the Greenplum-Kafka Connector, the headline feature of Pivotal Greenplum 5.10.
